EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{{lead.First Name:default=Conference attendee}}, the data is out, and it is big. Be one of the first to see the groundbreaking research on America's independent workers in this brand new infographic <http://www.mbopartners.com/state-of-independence/americas-self-employed.html>. Let's talk in Chicago, Jay ___________________________________ Jay Lash VP of Market Strategies MBO Partners
